people.name: Jordan Smith
people.title: Engineering Manager
people.bio: Leading the Trust & Safety engineering team, focused on building scalable content moderation systems. Former Staff Engineer at Meta, passionate about ML and safety infrastructure.

people.name: Sam Rivera
people.title: Senior Software Engineer
people.bio: Your onboarding buddy! Been at Airbnb for 3 years working on content classification systems. Happy to help with Python, ML pipelines, and navigating the codebase. Always up for a coffee chat!

people.name: Morgan Lee
people.title: Staff Software Engineer
people.bio: Technical lead for Trust & Safety infrastructure. Expert in distributed systems and real-time processing. Great resource for architecture discussions and system design questions.

people.name: Taylor Kim
people.title: Senior Product Manager
people.bio: PM partner for Trust & Safety features. Works closely with engineering on content moderation tools and policy enforcement. Former PM at Twitter Safety.

people.name: Quinn Martinez
people.title: Software Engineer
people.bio: Fellow team member who joined last year. Great peer for comparing onboarding experiences and learning the team's workflows together.

people.name: Jamie Wong
people.title: Senior Software Engineer
people.bio: Payments platform engineer. Good connection for understanding cross-team collaboration and Airbnb's service architecture.

people.name: Casey Park
people.title: Senior Product Manager
people.bio: Leading Experiences product team, focusing on connecting guests with unique local activities. Passionate about marketplace dynamics and host success.

people.name: Riley Chen
people.title: Senior Product Manager
people.bio: Your onboarding buddy! Excited to help you ramp up on Experiences product area. Happy to share context on strategy, stakeholders, and how PMs work at Airbnb.

people.name: Phoenix Lee
people.title: Product Designer
people.bio: Design partner for Experiences team. Passionate about user-centered design and creating delightful booking experiences.

people.name: Dakota Singh
people.title: Product Manager
people.bio: PM for Host Tools. Great resource for understanding the host side of the marketplace and cross-functional collaboration.

people.name: Morgan Taylor
people.title: Employee Experience Manager
people.bio: Leading the Employee Experience team. Focused on making Airbnb an amazing place to work through better processes, tools, and programs.

people.name: Avery Kim
people.title: Senior People Operations Coordinator
people.bio: Your onboarding buddy! Happy to help you learn Workday, benefits administration, and all the HR systems. I've been here for 2+ years and love helping new team members.

people.name: Sage Wilson
people.title: Recruiting Coordinator
people.bio: Recruiting Operations coordinator. Great connection for understanding the candidate experience and Greenhouse workflows.
